results.name: Define a 1-1 correspondence between the integers Z and the nonnegative integers N by f(n) = A102370(n) if n >= 0, f(n) = A102371(-n) if n < 0; sequence gives a(n) = f^(-1)(n) for n >= 0.
comment: A 1-1 map from the nonnegative integers to all integers.
